plot: An allegorical story about a day in the life of a man who wakes up, stabs himself in the chest and goes to the office like nothing happened.
title: The Happiest Man Alive
plot_es: An allegorical story about a day in the life of a man who wakes up, stabs himself in the chest and goes to the office like nothing happened.
plot_en: An allegorical story about a day in the life of a man who wakes up, stabs himself in the chest and goes to the office like nothing happened.
